com.jr7.cystudy.repository

Interface TermsRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Terms,java.lang.String>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Terms,java.lang.String>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Terms,java.lang.String>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Terms>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Terms,java.lang.String>

    @Repository
 @Transactional
public interface TermsRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Terms,java.lang.String>
    Connection to terms table in the MySQL database.
    Author:
    Zach Gorman

      • getTermsByClassName

        java.util.List<Terms> getTermsByClassName(java.lang.String className)
        Get all of the flashcards (AKA terms) that a specific class has
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        List of all flashcards in a class

      • deleteCard

        @Modifying
void deleteCard(java.lang.String term,
                           java.lang.String answer,
                           java.lang.String className)
        Modifying command to the terms table to delete a specific term
        Parameters:
        term - The "question" part of a flashcard
        answer - The "answer" part of a flashcard
        className - The name of the class that the flashcard is in
